greeting: Greetings from The On-Line Encyclopedia of Integer Sequences! http://oeis.org/

results.name: Triangle, read by rows, where T(n,k) = C(n,k)*(C(n,k) + 1)/2, n>=k>=0.
comment: Replace each number x in Pascal's triangle by x(x+1)/2. - _Charlie Marion_, May 31 2013
formula: n-th row sum equals A005317(n) = (C(2n, n) + 2^n)/2.
results.author: _Paul D. Hanna_, May 21 2005
